Text: Thrill Seekers:  It was hosted by Chuck Connors and featured people who did dangerous stunts.

Text: Thrill Seekers:  Her episode of "Thrill Seekers" was shot at Terre Haute showgrounds, Indiana, where Cranston performed a high fall into cardboard boxes, did a hit and run at 30 mph, and was run over by a truck which drove over a plank placed across her midriff (see Cranston; also Crawford Productions).
Triplets:<Thrill Seekers
